channel.title: Unused content in the files
channel.description:
I've been busy searching through the mod files to see what's available when I came across these four skins for the female scientists:
[img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/18318949/unusedscientist.png[/img]
Now, I've already completed the mod and there only seems to be three female scientist skins used (Blonde middle aged, elderly grey-haired, brown haired young etc etc.) and I never came across one using any of those above skins - the fact that the hairstyle bodygroups available are designed only for the same used three skins seems to support the fact that these four skins weren't meant to appear ingame, you can't even get any of them via spawning through the console.
It makes me wonder if they actually do appear in the mod or not, or if there's any other unused stuff lying about.

item.title: Unused content in the files
item.dc:creator: James_Rossi
item.description:
I would have had Eli in that room as well, then when you snag your suit he’d have had time to go meet up with Kleiner in the labs. Or a possible Breen cameo.

Read full topic

item.title: Unused content in the files
item.dc:creator: David_VI
item.description:
Can I just guess? It’s not “Prepare for unforseen consequences” is it? Although I believe hes supposed to have said that to Eli.

Edit: I was ninja’ed! Well that is odd.

Read full topic

item.title: Unused content in the files
item.dc:creator: James_Rossi
item.description:
Located in C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\sourcemods\BMS\scenes\c1a0a\gmanroom_conversation.vcd

Here’s the lip syncing info. It omits a few small connecting words and a couple things appear out of order.

"THIS" 0.016656 1 "IS" 0.030084 1 "NOT" 0.040036 1 "YOUR" 0.054027 1 "DECISIOn" 0.058906 0 "MAKE" 0.084216 1 "TO" 0.085401 1 "YOU" 0.112728 1 "MUST" 0.130448 1 "NOT" 0.144994 1 "GET" 0.157953 1 "IN" 0.165888 1 "WAY" 0.179905 1 "I" 0.434212 1 "WANT" 0.446367 1 "TO" 0.458191 1 "GIVE" 0.468435 1 "HIM" 0.477156 1 "ANSWER/OFFER" 0.492545 1 "HE" 0.501273 1 "WONT" 0.504270 1 "REGRET" 0.509912 1 "MY" 0.699102 1 "EMPLOYERS" 0.710651 1 "DONT" 0.733925 1 "AGREE" 0.752791 1 "YOUR" 0.814326 1 "SCIENTISTS" 0.829577 1 "ARE" 0.869690 1 "A" 0.883972 1 "FRAUD" 0.894727 1 "BACK" 0.923202 1 "OFF" 0.934310 1

Read full topic

item.title: Unused content in the files
item.dc:creator: James_Rossi
item.description:
Lemonz&oranges:

[whisper]thereisalsonihilanthsoundfilesinthegamefiles[/whisper]

The Nihilanth breathing is heard at the end of the game after jumping through the portal.

I found some interesting things out in the mod files. For instance you can find out what G-Man is lipsynced as saying in that office where you hear mumbling.

Read full topic

item.title: Unused content in the files
item.dc:creator: Blooper_Reel
item.description:
I’ve been busy searching through the mod files to see what’s available when I came across these four skins for the female scientists:

Now, I’ve already completed the mod and there only seems to be three female scientist skins used (Blonde middle aged, elderly grey-haired, brown haired young etc etc.) and I never came across one using any of those above skins - the fact that the hairstyle bodygroups available are designed only for the same used three skins seems to support the fact that these four skins weren’t meant to appear ingame, you can’t even get any of them via spawning through the console.

It makes me wonder if they actually do appear in the mod or not, or if there’s any other unused stuff lying about.
